item.title: Lower Lobe Cargo A/C Cabin Shutoff Valve(s)

numlitem.para: Lower lobe cargo A/C FLOW RATE remains in OFF or LOW position, and

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals and perishables in associated lower cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Lower Lobe Cargo Cond Air Flow Rate selector "HIGH RATE INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify the associated Cargo A/C Cabin Shutoff Valve(s) are open by selecting the ECS Maintenance page on the CMC and observing that CABIN SOV POS indicates open (OP) for both LWR FWD and LWR AFT valves.
Position the Lower Lobe Cargo Cond Air Flow Rate selector to either LOW or OFF.
